data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (put_media_connection_errors IS NULL OR put_media_connection_errors <= 0) AND (put_media_error_ack_count IS NULL OR put_media_error_ack_count <= 0) AND (put_media_buffering_ack_latency IS NULL OR put_media_buffering_ack_latency < 0.1) AND (put_media_persisted_ack_latency IS NULL OR put_media_persisted_ack_latency < 0.1) AND (put_media_received_ack_latency IS NULL OR put_media_received_ack_latency < 0.1) AND (put_media_fragment_persist_latency IS NULL OR put_media_fragment_persist_latency < 0.1) AND (put_media_fragment_ingestion_latency IS NULL OR put_media_fragment_ingestion_latency < 0.1) AND (list_fragments_latency IS NULL OR list_fragments_latency < 0.1)) AS 'Health Score' FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream FACET amazon_kinesis_video_stream_name
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_kinesis_video_stream_name) AS 'Video Streams' FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream FACET region

presentation.title: Region Distribution
presentation.notes: The AWS Region this object belongs to.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(get_media_successes) FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(put_media_connection_errors) FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: PutMedia Connection Errors (Errors)
presentation.notes: Total number of errors while establishing PutMedia connection for the stream.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(put_media_error_ack_count) FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: PutMedia Error ACK Count
presentation.notes: Total number of Error ACKs sent while doing PutMedia for the stream.

data.nrql: SELECT average(put_media_buffering_ack_latency) FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: PutMedia Buffering ACK Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: Time difference between when the first byte of a new fragment is received by Kinesis Video Streams and when the Buffering Ack is sent for the fragment.

data.nrql: SELECT average(put_media_persisted_ack_latency) FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: PutMedia Persisted ACK Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: Time difference between when the last byte of a new fragment is received by and when the Persisted ACK is sent for the fragment.

data.nrql: SELECT average(put_media_received_ack_latency) FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: PutMedia Received ACK Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: Time difference between when the last byte of a new fragment is received by and when the Buffering ACK is sent for the fragment.

data.nrql: SELECT average(list_fragments_latency) FROM amazon_kinesis_video_stream COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: ListFragments Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: Latency of the ListFragments API calls for the given stream name.
